project_abstract.cdata: The project for which the proposed credit would be made covers all the works included in the Borrowers's program up to July 1973 for the expansion of local telephone exchanges and of international and long distance communication facilities, the installation of telex facilities and the employment of consultants to assist in the reorganization of NTB. The project is technically sound and well-balanced and NTB will be capable of carrying it out and operating the new facilities efficiently.
